# {{lb|fr|mathematics}} [[inflection point]], [[point of inflection]] {{gloss|a point on a curve at which the sign of the curvature changes; at this point the second derivative of the underlying function will be zero, but positive on one side and negative on the other}}
types.html:
point d'inflexion m (plural points d'inflexion)

  1. (mathematics) inflection point, point of inflection (a point on a curve at which the sign of the curvature changes; at this point the second derivative of the underlying function will be zero, but positive on one side and negative on the other)

title: point d'inflexion
